message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. That's the most I'm willing to pay.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I can meet you halfway at $165, which is a significant discount from my initial offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $140?

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make a profit. I can do $155, which is a bit higher than your latest offer, but still a good deal for you. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $145?

I can see you're really trying to get a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $150, which is the lowest I can go. If you're still interested, I can make it happen. But if not, I'll have to consider other options.
